1429300.name: The Fishery
1429300.description:
The Fishery is a 2D fishing and life RPG-simulator. Choose your bait, head to the bankside and cast away; with various locations and fish to catch, you'll never want to leave! A lot of the features have been suggested by the community - your feedback is crucial and always listened to!

Current Features


  • Catch over (currently) 16 species of fish, with even more to come!
  • Each species of fish have their own bait preferences, preferred times of day/night, location preferences and more!
  • A day and night cycle, including the option to fast forward time
  • A foraging system. Don't have enough money for bait? Then get your hands dirty and search in logs, under rocks, pick berries of bushes and more to come!
  • A unique collection system. Complete collections and earn exclusive, limited time rewards!
  • Wildlife in and around the lakes! Immerse yourself in the world of The Fishery with active and reactive wildlife!
  • Skins. Customise your character with exclusive skins, which can be earned through collections and/or limited time events!
  • Unique fish. Catch named, unique fish and ultimately test your fishing skills!
  • NPC(s). Interact with NPC(s).
  • Achievements. Hunt down those elusive fish and challenges to earn and unlock awesome achievements!


Please remember this game is in early beta and is in active development; more complex functions and features are planned!
1429300.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
